text: Army of Shadows () is a 1969 French Italian World War II suspense drama movie directed by Jean-Pierre Melville and based on the 1943 novel of the same name by Joseph Kessel. It stars Lino Ventura, Paul Meurisse, Jean-Pierre Cassel, Simone Signoret, Claude Mann, Paul Crauchet, Christian Barbier, Serge Reggiani. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1969 drama movies Category:1969 war movies Category:French drama movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Jean-Pierre Melville Category:Movies set in Paris
title: Army of Shadows
